title: Virgin Galactic, Alexion, Pluralsight, Pfizer: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: U.S. stock futures rose on optimism surrounding stimulus and vaccine rollouts
body:
Here’s what we are watching as markets kick into gear Monday.
—U.S. stock futures rose on optimism that talks for additional stimulus are progressing and that the rollout of Covid-19 vaccines could help stem the pandemic.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 ticked up 0.7%, suggesting the index may edge higher after the New York opening bell. Contracts tied to the Nasdaq-100 Index gained 0.5%.
Read our full markets wrap here.
— Amdocs and Plantronics are among companies presenting at the Cowen Networking Summit.
